item.title: 我听说今天对俄罗斯卡卢加炼油厂的无人机袭击是由乌克兰 GUR 军事情报机构实施的。本周早些时候，SBU.@FT即时新闻进行了袭击：乌克兰打击俄罗斯炼油厂的行动愈演愈烈
item.description:
I'm told that today's drone attack on a Russian oil refinery in Kaluga was conducted by Ukraine’s GUR military intel. Strikes earlier this week, by the SBU.@FT live news: Ukraine strikes another Russian refinery as campaign to hit economy intensifies https://t.co/druryIa10u

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 15, 2024

item.title: 分析人士预测，随着电动汽车的迅速普及，内燃机汽车的销售陷入停滞，未来十年中国汽车市场将出现数百家 "僵尸工厂"。
item.description:
Analysts are predicting the emergence of hundreds of zombie factories over the next decade in the Chinese car market as the rapid switch to electric vehicles has stalled sales of internal combustion engine cars https://t.co/A1pJ2OTsHo pic.twitter.com/EkzdTMIgWi

— Financial Times (@FT) March 15, 2024

item.title: @LOS_Fisher 的数字计算令人着迷和愤怒。如果答案是 "没有"，那么这又有什么意义呢？
item.description:

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) March 14, 2024
